title: Bolsonaro’s former VP calls for military revolt after police operation
description:
Senator and retired Army General Hamilton Mourão took to the Senate stand on Thursday to ask the Armed Forces to revolt against an operation carried out by the Federal Police and approved by the Supreme Court, accusing former President Jair Bolsonaro and many of his acolytes of coordinating to stage a coup at the end […]

The post Bolsonaro’s former VP calls for military revolt after police operation appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: B is for Bukele and Bolsonaro
description:
When Nayib Bukele, the president of El Salvador who was comfortably reelected this week, fired members of the Supreme Court and replaced them with judges who agreed with his plans for total political dominance in 2021, Brazilian lawmaker Eduardo Bolsonaro, the third-eldest son of former president Jair Bolsonaro, celebrated the decision on his social media.  […]

The post B is for Bukele and Bolsonaro  appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: The Brazilian Report listed among ‘Best International Reporting on Rio’s Favelas’ 2023
description:
Three articles published by The Brazilian Report last year came in for praise in a media watchdog report that lists the best news coverage of the complexities, challenges, and opportunities in Rio de Janeiro’s favelas in 2023.  Renowned international outlets such as The Guardian, Reuters, and The New York Times, among others, are also on […]

The post The Brazilian Report listed among ‘Best International Reporting on Rio’s Favelas’ 2023 appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Chair of Bolsonaro’s party arrested on weapons charges
description:
Valdemar Costa Neto, chairman of Jair Bolsonaro’s far-right Liberal Party, was arrested Thursday after federal marshals found an illegal firearm in his possession while carrying out a search-and-seizure warrant at his home. The operation is part of a wide-ranging investigation into the workings of a criminal organization that police say “tried to stage a coup […]

The post Chair of Bolsonaro’s party arrested on weapons charges appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Brazilian January inflation hotter than expected
description:
Consumer prices in Brazil rose 0.42 percent last month, according to new data from the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE). In the 12 months to January, inflation reached 4.51 percent. While headline inflation is on the decline, the numbers are cause for concern. For one thing, January’s results were well above market expectations, […]

The post Brazilian January inflation hotter than expected appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
